content:
As of March 12, there are 3 enemy ships in the Mediterranean on Mediterrane, including 2 carriers of the Caliber Winged missiles, up to 12 missiles.

About thisinformNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are no enemy ships in the Black Sea.

There is one enemy ship in the Azov Sea.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 20 vessels to the Azov Sea, 5 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 20 vessels, 4 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

As reportedArmyinform, On March 11, the Air Force destroyed the enemy control point on the ship.
title: In the Mediterranean the enemy holds two carriers
description: The Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. In the Black Sea, enemy ships ...
author: Army Inform
